contents: 给ScrollSelect添加disabled属性，可以禁用整个组件；给组件添加disable函数用来禁用单独的数据项。本例中，我们可以传入disable函数来禁用闰年选项

highlighted.content:
import ScrollSelect from 'kpc/components/scrollSelect';

<ScrollSelect
    data={{ self.generateData }}
    v-model="value"
    disable={{ self.disable }}
/>

import Intact from 'intact';
import template from './index.vdt';

export default class extends Intact {
    @Intact.template()
    static template = template;

    defaults() {
        return {
            value: 2018
        };
    }

    generateData(value) {
        const start = value - 5;
        return Array.apply(null, {length: 10})
            .map((v, i) => {
                const year = start + i; 
                return {
                    label: `${year}年`,
                    value: year
                };
            });
    }

    disable(value) {
        // 排除闰年
        return value % 4 === 0 && (value % 100 !== 0 || value % 400 === 0);
    }
}

<template>
    <ScrollSelect
        :data="generateData"
        v-model="value"
        :disable="disable"
    />
</template>
<script>
import ScrollSelect from 'kpc-vue/components/scrollSelect';

export default {
    components: {
        ScrollSelect
    },
    data() {
        return {
            "value": 2018
        }
    },
    methods: {
        generateData(value) {
            const start = value - 5;
            return Array.apply(null, {length: 10})
                .map((v, i) => {
                    const year = start + i; 
                    return {
                        label: `${year}年`,
                        value: year
                    };
                });
        },
        disable(value) {
            // 排除闰年
            return value % 4 === 0 && (value % 100 !== 0 || value % 400 === 0);
        },
    },
}
</script>

import React from 'react';
import ScrollSelect from 'kpc-react/components/scrollSelect';

export default class Demo extends React.Component {
    constructor(props) {
        super(props);
        this.state = {
            "value": 2018
        };
        this.generateData = this.generateData.bind(this);
        this.disable = this.disable.bind(this);
    }

    generateData(value) {
        const start = value - 5;
        return Array.apply(null, {length: 10})
            .map((v, i) => {
                const year = start + i; 
                return {
                    label: `${year}年`,
                    value: year
                };
            });
    }
    
    disable(value) {
        // 排除闰年
        return value % 4 === 0 && (value % 100 !== 0 || value % 400 === 0);
    }
    
    render() {
        return (
            <ScrollSelect
                data={this.generateData}
                value={this.state.value}
                on$change-value={(c, value) => this.setState({value})}
                disable={this.disable}
            />
        )
    }
}

import {Component} from '@angular/core';

@Component({
    selector: 'app-demo',
    template: `
        <k-scroll-select
            [data]="generateData"
            [(value)]="value"
            [disable]="disable"
        ></k-scroll-select>
    `,
})
export class AppDemoComponent {
    private value = 2018;

    generateData = (value) => {
        const start = value - 5;
        return Array.apply(null, {length: 10})
            .map((v, i) => {
                const year = start + i; 
                return {
                    label: `${year}年`,
                    value: year
                };
            });
    }
    
    disable = (value) => {
        // 排除闰年
        return value % 4 === 0 && (value % 100 !== 0 || value % 400 === 0);
    }
}
